summary: After a traumatic accident, a woman becomes drawn to a mysterious abandoned carnival.
cast: Candace Hilligoss|Frances Feist|Sidney Berger|Art Ellison|Stan Levitt|Tom McGinnis|Forbes Caldwell|Dan Palmquist|Bill de Jarnette|Steve Boozer|Pamela Ballard|Larry Sneegas|Cari Conboy|Karen Pyles|T.C. Adams|Sharon Scoville|Mary Ann Harris|Peter Schnitzler|Bill Sollner|Reza Badiyi|Ed Down|Herk Harvey|Wayne Schmille
title: El carnaval de las almas
